title: Battle of Britain
writer: James Kennaway (screenplay), Wilfred Greatorex (screenplay), Derek Dempster (book), Derek Wood (book)
actors: Harry Andrews, Michael Caine, Trevor Howard, Curd JÃ¼rgens
plot: Historical reenactment of the air war in the early days of World War Two for control of the skies over Britain as the new Luftwaffe and the Royal Air Force determine whether or not an invasion can take place.
awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win.
